title: What would happen if all the screens went away, TVs, cellphones, computers, and tablets? Would the world just end? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. People would in time, reestablish local activities and groups to occupy their interests and abilities. There would be .ore: live music gatherings, dances, competitions. Literary groups. Theater groups. Science leagues. Religious gatherings. Debating clubs.. Speakers dinners. Poet corners.. Common luncheons, and themed dinners. Etc. Just as went on in the 1700–1800s. People would be bored, and would seek to fill in their intellectual and entertainment voids.

Think about your question. Do you know anything about history? People lived thousands of years before we had these things. Computers haven’t been available until recently. No cell phones 📱,no TV. No electricity or indoor plumbing. The world 🌎 will end when you can’t put fires out around the globe 🌍.
